FaMLE Video Resources Contact

FaMLE, the MIT Laptop Ensemble, is a forum for the exploration of emerging digital musical practices, with a particular focus on collaborative music performance.

We use a variety of software and hardware instruments to learn about current performance techniques, and ensemble members have the opportunity to create new compositions and instruments to explore their personal musical interests.

Open to all members of the MIT community, FaMLE offers a practice-based vision of the future of digital musicianship.
